title: Gnawing, Biting, Hacking, Burning (6U63)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [Isengard] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Shadow: Discard 2 cards stacked here and remove (1) to play an [Isengard] Orc from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'Destroyers and usurpers.'”
Rarity:	U
